original_text: You did not put oil on my head. But she has brought oil with a nice smell and put it on my feet.
korean_text: 너는 내 머리에 감람유도 붓지 아니하였으되 그는 향유를 내 발에 부었느니라

sentences.original_text: You did not put oil on my head
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 내 머리에 기름을 부지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: and put it on my feet
